roleset.name: unique (to an entity/locale)
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Comparison to 'specific.02'.

example.name: arg1
example.text: He said that the " dual system " phenomenon is particular in our country and it 's different to international situations .

example.name: both args
example.text: But this is particular to Oracle, and it gives me syntax error when executing queries on Microsoft SQL Server. I

roleset.name: choosy, picky, expressing with great detail

role.descr: subject matter arg0 is picky about

example.name: both args
example.text: My Chocolate Lab is particular about his water source.
